Row.Text: We are happy to welcome your delegation to our capital.
Your trade delegation arrived at my capital, where we welcomed them with open arms. And thank you for your gifts.
We received your delegation at the palace. Thank you. The gifts will be treasured.
I received your offerings to the New Isis from your trade delegation. I will remember your kindness.
Your envoy arrived and I welcomed them personally. Our Empire could benefit from diplomacy.
You are too kind, my friend. Your gifts arrived with your trade delegation, and I have personally thanked them.
Gilgamesh has received your tributes and your envoy. He will let them enter Uruk.
Spartans are not interested in material goods, but I thank you for the gifts your delegation brought me.
Your delegation has arrived. We welcomed them with a feast in the longhouse.
Your delegation arrived, and we are humbled by your generosity.
We are happy to welcome your delegation to our capital.
The people happily received your delegation and gifts. Thank you.
Your trade delegation arrived, and I am always happy to receive visitors from abroad, especially when they bring gifts.
We received the heret- I mean, your trade delegation. I will be sure to instruct them in our ways.
We are happy to welcome your trade delegation. They will be treated with the honor they deserve.
A thousand thanks for your gifts. Your delegation will be treated with the utmost regard.
I welcome your delegation to the great United States of America.
Your delegation arrived bearing your tribute to the Empress. It is greatly appreciated.
Your trade delegation arrived, saw, and conquered us with their kindness. Thank you for the gifts.
We have received your trade delegation and you may rest assured that we will treat them with the dignity they deserve.
We politely refuse your delegation.
I cannot say yes.
Tempting, but no.
Maybe some other time?
No, of course not.
Unfortunately, no.
I think not.
Not this time.
No. I can’t accept.
No, thank you.
We politely refuse your delegation.
Athens declines.
I cannot accept.
I cannot accept.
We reject your offer.
No, we cannot accept.
We must decline.
I will not accept.
A good offer, but I cannot accept.
My Parliament does not approve.
Will you receive our diplomatic delegation in your capital?
My trade delegation should be arriving soon with fufu. Enjoy the meal!
I have sent you a trade delegation with all of the customary gifts : herbs, olives, various cheeses, and baguettes to eat them with, of course.
My diplomatic delegation brings you a small gift of papyrus from the New Isis. Welcome them as you would welcome me.
We have sent a diplomatic envoy to you. Treat them as you would treat me, the Duke of Swabia, King of Burgundy, King of Germany, King of the Romans, King of Italy, and Holy Roman Emperor.
I have sent a trade delegation to you with gifts from our land: teas, sarees, and sitars.
The delegation of Gilgamesh brings you gifts of Sumerian jewelry, and lyres from Ur. Will you accept them into your city?
A Spartan delegation honors you with gifts of olive oil and black broth. Accept them with honor.
I have sent you traders with gifts of rune stones. They are powerful - the stones, not the traders.
We have sent you a delegation with gifts of yosegi-zukuri, some of our greatest works.
Will you receive our diplomatic delegation in your capital?
We have sent you a delegation bearing gifts. Don’t be alarmed, there’s no large wooden horse involved.
I have sent you a trade delegation bearing gifts of the finest caviar. Please enjoy.
I have sent a delegation to your city. Please, enjoy the churros and welcome them kindly.
Our trade delegation should be arriving soon with gifts of the finest spices, tea, and silk in the Middle Kingdom. Please, enjoy.

I have sent a delegation to you with gifts from our empire. They bring the sweetest fruit, rare snow to cool you on even the hottest day, and the most excellent of horses. Please receive them as our courtesy.
It’s good to see you. My diplomatic delegation should be arriving soon with some fresh-baked apple pies. I’m sure you’ll give them a warm welcome.
I have sent you a trade delegation bearing a decorated gorytos as a gift for you. You do have a bow, yes?
I have sent a trade delegation to you. Enjoy the Pecorino Romano: the finest salted, sheeps-milk cheese you will ever have.
Greetings. We have sent a Royal envoy on behalf of the United Kingdom. We hope they are well received.
Our capital is not open to visitors at this time.
Your delegation is most welcome.
Excellent!
That is too bad, perhaps at a later date.
